## What is a Serial Number and an Activation Code for CorelDRAW Graphics Suite X4?
 
A serial number is a unique 24-digit code that identifies your copy of CorelDRAW Graphics Suite X4. You can find your serial number on the back of your CD case or on the confirmation email that you received when you purchased the software online.
 
An activation code is a 25-digit code that verifies that your copy of CorelDRAW Graphics Suite X4 is genuine and not pirated. You can obtain your activation code by registering your product online or by calling Corel customer service.

## How to Register Your Product Online and Get Your Activation Code?
 
To register your product online and get your activation code, follow these steps:
 
1. Launch CorelDRAW Graphics Suite X4 and click on the Help menu.
2. Select Sign In from the drop-down menu.
3. Create a Corel account or sign in with your existing account.
4. Enter your serial number and click on Register Now.
5. You will receive an email with your activation code.

## How to Call Corel Customer Service and Get Your Activation Code?
 
To call Corel customer service and get your activation code, follow these steps:

1. Launch CorelDRAW Graphics Suite X4 and click on the Help menu.
2. Select Activate Now from the drop-down menu.
3. Select Phone Corel from the options.
4. You will see a phone number and an installation code on the screen.
5. Call the phone number and provide the installation code to the representative.
6. You will receive an activation code from the representative.

## How to Enter Your Serial Number and Activation Code?
 
To enter your serial number and activation code, follow these steps:

1. Launch CorelDRAW Graphics Suite X4 and click on the Help menu.
2. Select Activate Now from the drop-down menu.
3. Select Enter Serial Number from the options.
4. Type in your serial number and click on Next.
5. Type in your activation code and click on Activate Now.
6. You will see a confirmation message that your product is activated.
